```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(httr)

#Run this command to open the ,Rprofile key to store your API key
usethis::edit_r_profile()

#retrieve API key stored in .Rprofile
nasa_key <- getOption("nasa_key")

theme_set(theme_minimal())
```


```{r}

nasa_data <- GET("https://api.nasa.gov/neo/rest/v1/feed?",
                 query = list(start_date = 2020-04-26,
                              end_date = 2020-04-30,
                              api_key = nasa_key))
content(nasa_data)

```
